.. _api:

#################
API reference
#################

:Release: |version|
:Date: |today|


.. currentmodule:: sisl

This reference manual describes in detail how the modules, classes
and functions can be used and how their API's are defined.

These documents are complemented with the sisl tutorial.

All methods and submodules are listed  :ref:`here <genindex>` and
:ref:`here <modindex>`, respectively.
